entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
